\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	{\,} \& {\coprod _{\lambda \in \Lambda}|\partial \Delta ^n|} \&\& {\coprod _{\lambda \in \Lambda}|\Delta ^n|} \& {\,} \\
	\& {K_{n-1}} \&\& {K_n}
	\arrow["{\coprod _{\lambda \in \Lambda} i^n}", from=1-2, to=1-4]
	\arrow["{(a_n^\lambda)}"', from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\text{PO}}"{description}, draw=none, from=1-2, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=2-4]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
